Message:
Watching the trembling Liberia
attempt to guard me,
I suddenly had an idea.

If it’s to save just one of us,
there is a way.
I simply have to betray her.

But, our friendship really was
doomed from the start.
Reaching an understanding with
the People of the Sand is just...

So, this is just how
it has to be, right?

“Hmph! What a waste...!
And just when I had you
good and fooled, too.”

As I coldly said that,
Liberia looked back at me
with a shocked expression
on her face.

“You really are as dense
as a rock, aren’t you?

Did you really think
the likes of you
could ever become friends
with someone like me?”
